section.name: Jadabs
section.p: Jadabs is a dynamic lightweight container for small devices in a distributed environment.

section.name: Apache Axis
section.p: Converts Java Objects to SOAP data and back. Runs on a web server.
Product homepage: http://ws.apache.org/axis. Version used in this project: 1.1

section.name: Apache Jakarta Tomcat
section.p: Tomcat is a web server that functions as a servlet container.
Product homepage: http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat. Version used in this project: 5.5.4

section.name: kSOAP
section.p: Converts Java Objects to SOAP data and back. Runs on very small devices like a mobile phone.
Product homepage: http://ksoap.objectweb.org. Version used in this project: 1.2
